capstone.title: Boogie And Brush
capstone.brief: The need for this app became clear when the following statistic came across my desk: children only brush their teeth 6 times a week. So, I designed a solution that would motivate children to brush for a full 2 minutes by creating their own 2 minute song, displaying a how-to animation for 2 minutes, and then awarding them with a digital sticker for each brushing (all while including parental monitoring).
capstone.technologiesUsed: AngularJS, Firebase Database and Hosting, Sass, Material Design, MomentJS, Angular Sound Manager, Version Control with Github

battledome.title: Robot Battledome
battledome.brief: What originally began as a simple 'mastery exercise' for the Modern Javascript Developer milestone, snowballed into a personal favorite project. Users create their robots and battle them to the death. Simple as that.
battledome.technologiesUsed: jQuery, Prototypal Inheritance, AJAX and JSON, Custom JS Utility Functions, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

movieHistory.title: Movie History
movieHistory.brief: When you work full-time and studenting part-time, you just don't have time to watch all the movies you want. With this app, you can look up any movie (yes, even Vampire Dog), view details and add it to your watchlist. You can manage your watchlist and rate movies once you do finally get to viewing them.
movieHistory.technologiesUsed: AngularJS, Firebase Database and Hosting, Sass, Material Design, OMDB API, Version Control with Github

chatty.title: Chatty
chatty.brief: The simple assignment description: an AIM chat clone. The Result? an AIM chat clone with some new twists: emojis, attention-grabbing styling for swear words, custom themes and artificial intelligence. With Agile development and some very talented teammates, these bonus features were implemented seamlessly.
chatty.technologiesUsed: CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, IIFE and augmentation, AJAX, JSON, Version Control with Github
